solution_line_template: Madison can spit a seed {madison_percent_num}% farther than Billy's {billy_distance} inches so that's {madison_percent_decimal}*{billy_distance} = <<{madison_percent_num}*{percent_factor}*{billy_distance}={madison_extra_distance}>>{madison_extra_distance} inches farther

Billy spits a seed {billy_distance} inches and Madison can spit {madison_extra_distance} inches farther for a total of {billy_distance}+{madison_extra_distance} = <<{billy_distance}+{madison_extra_distance}={madison_distance}>>{madison_distance} inches

Ryan can spit a seed {ryan_percent_num}% shorter than Madison's {madison_distance} inches for a total of {ryan_percent_decimal}*{madison_distance} = <<{ryan_percent_num}*{percent_factor}*{madison_distance}={ryan_shorter_distance}>>{ryan_shorter_distance} inches
